poem:
Title: "In Remembered Stanzas"

Costa Brava, Twiggy—resounding names,
In '69's chaotic arcades of fame.
Games of politics and desire's refrain,
Scribed by Muggeridge, a truth-infused pain.
Space exploration, dismissed, yet awed,
By the moon that mankind briefly trod.
In his words we find the past,
A decade condensed, fleeting and vast.
